name: Band of Vaulted Secrets
tooltip:
Band of Vaulted SecretsLevel 60

Bring 1 Qiraji Magisterial Ring, 2 Azure Idols, 5 Gold Scarabs and 5 Clay Scarabs to Windcaller Yessendra in Silithus.  You must also attain Honored reputation with Cenarion Circle to complete this quest.

Requirements:
- Qiraji Magisterial Ring
- Azure Idol x 2
- Gold Scarab x 5
- Clay Scarab x 5
- Cenarion Circle:
